source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_00<tab>Mumugoi has vast amounts of dirty and dangerous work for an adventurer.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_00<tab>Mumugoi, qui n'a pas vu un aventurier depuis longtemps, a besoin d'un coup de main.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_01<tab>Mumugoi has expressed his concern to you over the harm being done to the equipment of Byregot's Strike by the abundance of sand in the area. In order to forestall further maintenance, he has asked you to clean up three such piles of sand in the immediate vicinity. He has also warned you of the smoke bombs that may have burrowed into them.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_01<tab>Mumugoi est excédé de passer le plus clair de son temps à se débarrasser du sable qui envahit ses affaires. Le mineur vous a demandé de l'aider en retirant trois <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61E8C7F0302 /var> autour du chantier de fouilles.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_02<tab>With much grit and elbow grease, you have banished both the sand piles and the bombs that lay within. Inform Mumugoi of the happy development.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez retiré les trois <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61E8C7F0302 /var> comme convenu. Retournez voir Mumugoi et parlez-lui.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_03<tab>Mumugoi was thrilled to see you so easily dispatch the nuisances infecting the Strike. However, he informs you there is much and more to do, as the dangerous smoke bombs which surround the dig are often drawn in by the heat of the machinery. In order to keep the work site free of unwanted visitors, extinguish four of these fiends.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_03<tab>Mumugoi vous a expliqué que <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03850302 /var> qui rôdent autour du chantier étaient irrésistiblement attirés par la chaleur dégagée par l'immense foreuse. Il vous a demandé d'abattre quatre de ces créatures pour calmer leurs ardeurs.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_04<tab>You have defeated four smoke bombs in an exemplary fashion. The heat-loving creatures perished in strange jubilation, for to them your dripping, febrile form was as a thing divine. Report your success to Mumugoi.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_04<tab>Vous êtes venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> à bout <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02850302 /var> comme convenu. Retournez voir Mumugoi et faites-lui un rapport.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_05<tab>Mumugoi rejoices in the knowledge that four of the area's bombs have been taken care of. He also seems appreciative to have been able to devote more time to his chosen profession instead of the vexatious details that usually preoccupy his time.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_SEQ_05<tab>Mumugoi regrette qu'il n'y ait pas plus d'ouvriers sur le chantier de fouilles. Il semblerait que les conditions de travail à la Foreuse de Byregot ne soient pas des plus clémentes...

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_TODO_00<tab>Remove the sand dunes and dispatch smoke bombs.

TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_000<tab>You see all this? All the excavation knowledge of Amajina & Sons Mineral Concern, put to use uncovering the remains of the Allagan Empire. We mine knowledge here, not ore!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_000<tab>J'aurais mieux fait d'y réfléchir à deux fois avant d'accepter ce boulot. C'est vraiment pas facile de travailler dans le désert. Le sable est absolument partout<var 1D /var>: dans nos sacs, dans nos outils, dans nos pompes... même dans les endroits les plus intimes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_001<tab>Now, that sounds grand─and it <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var>!─but most of my time is actually spent mothering this equipment. It's on account of the sand getting into the worst of places. And the damn stuff is everywhere!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_001<tab>Au final, j'ai l'impression de passer plus de temps à nettoyer mon matériel qu'à l'utiliser pour trouver les ruines de l'ancien empire d'Allag.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_002<tab>Which brings me to you, naturally. Your showing up now is a godssend, and who am I to refuse the gods? Could you remove the three piles of sand right over there? You be careful as you go about it, though: some smoke bombs have burrowed into them, and they're none too friendly.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_002<tab>Tiens, puisque tu es là, tu ne voudrais pas me filer un coup de main et retirer quelques <var 33 ((EObj)) 0DF61E8C7F0302 /var> pour moi<var 1D /var>? Ça ne te prendra pas plus de cinq minutes... sauf si <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02850302 /var> se cachent à l'intérieur. C'est rare, mais ça arrive. Donc sois prudent<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_015<tab>That was wonderful, adventurer! Those piles were growing larger by the day, and I can't tell you how <var 1A 02 /var>little<var 1A 01 /var> I wanted to clean them up myself...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_015<tab>Tu as fait vite, dis donc. Ça tombe plutôt bien, car j'ai un autre service à te demander. Je sais que j'abuse un peu, mais c'est tellement rare de voir des aventuriers dans le coin...

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_016<tab>But speaking of things I've no interest in doing, I'm sure you've noticed by now the glut of smoke bombs surrounding the site. Well, they're not here by chance; they're here on account of the equipment.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_016<tab>La foreuse que nous utilisons ici est formidable. Le problème, c'est que comme elle chauffe très fort, elle a tendance à attirer <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 03850302 /var> qui rôdent autour du chantier. Oui, les mêmes qui se cachent dans le sable<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_017<tab>The machines run bloody hot and the heat draws the bombs in. And every time that happens, we need to shut everything down or else risk them exploding on the lot of us. We'd all appreciate it if you could take care of four of the pesky devils.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_017<tab>À cause d'eux, on est obligés d'arrêter les opérations de forage cinq ou six fois par jour. Déjà qu'on n'avance pas bien vite... Est-ce que tu pourrais en abattre quelques-uns pour calmer leurs ardeurs, s'il te plaît<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_030<tab>By Nald and by Thal, freedom from distractions at last! Thanks to you, I might be able to spend more than a minute focusing on the dig. Nothing beats having an extra pair of hands around!
target: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_MUMUGOI_000_030<tab>Merci, ça m'aide beaucoup. Ah, si seulement on avait plus de bras à notre disposition, les fouilles progresseraient beaucoup plus rapidement. Enfin, c'est comme ça.

source: TEXT_GAIUSB108_00827_POP_MESSAGE_000<tab>A bomb bursts forth from the sand!
